text: Hurricane Idalia was a 2023 Atlantic tropical cyclone. The storm first affected Quintana Roo in the Mexican Yucatan Peninsula and western Cuba. The storm threatened hitting northern Florida as a strong Category 3 hurricane, particularly at the Big Bend parts of the state. States of emergency and tropical cyclone notices were posted from Florida to South Carolina. == References == Category:August 2023 events Category:2023 in weather Category:Natural disasters Category:Hurricanes
title: Hurricane Idalia
